extendedInfo.description: Signup now and get meetings with two participants free. Want larger meetings or Video Conferencing? Upgrade through your device. Get Fuze Meeting HD and youâll be running online meetings from your Android device in minutes. You can also attend any Fuze session without registering!FEATURES FOR REGISTERED USERS: â¢A free account includes online meetings and audio conferencing with no credit card required. â¢Start/schedule meetings and invite attendees from your address book â¢Start a multi-party HD video conference with up to 12 video streams right from your Android device **â¢Switch to the rear facing camera and share broadcast video with meeting participantsâ¢Add MS PowerPoint presentations, Word documents, PDFs, movies (including HD), images and other content to meetings from your Android device or from your Fuze Meeting content library â¢Zoom, pan and use our iPointâ¢ technology to engage your audience â¢Use your mobile device to join your audio conference or use our Call Meâ¢ feature to call your phone â¢Mute and unmute all or select participants â¢Make other mobile or web attendees presenters so they can share or markup content, or add content to the meetingâ¢During an active session, close Fuze, open other apps and upload supported documents...without ending your session!  FEATURES FOR UNREGISTERED USERS: â¢Fuze Meeting accounts are free but you donât need one to attend a meeting â¢Attend a meeting by clicking the link you were sent in IM or email or enter the meeting ID â¢Join our live daily demonstration to get a feel for everything the application can do or watch the demo video. Here are just a few of thing things you can do with Fuze on Android: â¢Start and manage your meetings from anywhere in the world with a mobile or WiFi networkâ¢Run your sales meeting from home or on the road â¢Start a technical support session, make someone a presenter and have them share their mac or PC screen for remote troubleshooting  â¢Use it to remotely control slides and other content in your board room!â¢Use Fuze Meeting to interoperate with existing Telepresence systems** Free Account includes 2 streams.  12 video Stream capability available exclusively with Fuze Business subscription (requires Wi-Fi or 4G for HD quality.)

reviews.title: incomplete client
reviews.comment: You can start the meetings you host, but using VOIP on your device doesn\'t work.  You can use the \"Call me\" option to have it ring a land line or a different device though.  Pretty weak, honestly.   Samsung Galaxy or Tablet.  ETA:  And of course, after writing this review, audio suddenly started working for the first time, on both devices.   Not sure why it failed all the times I\'ve tried in the past 6 months, or if it will work every time in the future.
reviews.author: Patrick Larkin

reviews.title: Good solution to save time from traveling
reviews.comment: Easy to use, working solution. No issues at all. Works fine on my Prestigio low-end tablet.

reviews.title: Perfect collaboration app
reviews.comment: I have a Fuze Meeting account and this, along with their smartphone-centered app, give me complete coverage for all our meetings. I can host from this app on phone AND tablet and it\'s super convenient. Especially with 4G on Verizon, it\'s pretty cool to be able to HOST a meeting with video participants, talking over VoIP, and pushing high def movies and documents to my team.
reviews.author: Austin Cavins
